experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: What I've Achieved
content: Frontend development specialized in React and Vue.js
Scalable CSS architecture with BEMIT methodologies

notebook.terminal:
console.log(damian.experience)

ADVANCED FRONTEND DEVELOPMENT
   • Reduced loading times by 40% in critical applications
   • Implemented lazy loading and code splitting
   • Developed reusable components with React
   • Collaborated on projects for real estate and logistics sectors

SCALABLE CSS ARCHITECTURE
   • Created maintainable design systems with BEMIT methodology
   • Optimized workflows with Git and GitHub
   • Developed with Less, Sass and modern JavaScript
   • Implemented agile methodologies (Scrum, Jira)

VUE.JS DEVELOPMENT
   • Built complex interfaces with Vue.js
   • Implemented responsive layout with Vuefy
   • Configured bundlers and build tools
   • Designed interactive visual components

LAYOUT AND EMAIL MARKETING
   • Created CSS/HTML layout systems
   • Implemented templates with Sass and Handlebars
   • Developed responsive compatible emails
   • Optimized workflows with Webpack

WORDPRESS DEVELOPMENT
   • Designed and developed complete WordPress themes
   • Implemented functionalities with Less and Bootstrap
   • Created unique user experiences
   • Optimized SEO and performance

CORPORATE FRONTEND DEVELOPMENT
   • Developed interfaces for Fortune 500 companies
   • Implemented HTML5/CSS3 and advanced JavaScript
   • Worked with Bootstrap and Foundation frameworks
   • Optimized with Sass and Less preprocessors

MULTIMEDIA DESIGN
